I received my first set of bills in the mail today.
Well, at least that tells you that you are actually alive, right?
I guess so, but I'd rather not have to pay them all.
Can you take a look at a couple of them for me?
The utility bill seems a little high to me.
Yes, it is a little high.
It's because it's your first month,...
So it won't be so high from now on.
